MonoBehaviour id=1339877307 on GameObject 'collider_porte' (PrefabInstance fileID=1339877303, parent 'trigger_pyramide') is an instance of script 'room2_trigger' (m_Script guid=f90cc8c0ee6cc9746bf3259c5e5bf2bc, fileID=11500000). Expected: In the next Update() of 'room2', since SphereChecked, CubeChecked, and PyramidChecked are all true and doorOpen is false, doorOpen becomes true and doorAnim.Play('DoorOpen', layer=0, normalizedTime=0.0f) is invoked once.
